item.title: Taste What You’ve Been Begging For
item.description:
Cover image generated via AI with assistance from Grok. We do not own the image.

She showed up at his door, uninvited.

No umbrella. Shirt soaked to her chest. No bra. Eyes sharp. Lips parted. Her thighs pressed together like she was trying to hold herself in.

He opened the door. Looked her up and down.

item.title: The Paper Story
item.description:
We all use paper.

We write on it, fold it, scribble our thoughts when no one’s watching. Sometimes, we use it to clean messes. Other times, we pour our poetry onto it. But never do we ask the paper if it’s ready.

It never resists.

Some days, we crush it in frustration. Not because it did anything wrong— but because we were trying. Trying to say something right. Trying to make it fit.
